Title: Generic versus branded antiepileptic drug monotherapy for epilepsy
Abstract: © 2015 The Cochrane Collaboration.This is the protocol for a review and there is no abstract. The objectives are as follows: To assess the relative efficacy, safety and pharmacokinetic profiles of different generic AEDs relative to the respective branded drug for the treatment of epileptic seizures and to describe the hidden costs of generic versus branded AEDs narratively.
